truth-or-dare-ice-breaker.question: Who in the room do you think has the best hair?
If you could switch lives with anyone for a day, who would it be and why?
What was the worst haircut you’ve ever had?
What’s the grossest thing you’ve found in your food?
Do you have a guiding quote or principle?
If you had to escape to another country, which one would you choose and why?
What’s the strangest food you’ve ever tried?
What hidden talent do you have that most people wouldn't expect?
Where is the weirdest place you’ve ever fallen asleep?
What’s the most embarrassing way you’ve injured yourself?
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve done out of boredom?
Have you ever pretended to like a gift you actually didn't? What was it?
What’s something that people often misunderstand about you?
Have you ever intentionally avoided someone you saw in public? Why?
What’s the most embarrassing playlist on your phone?
What’s a guilty pleasure song you love?
What’s the worst social media trend you’ve ever taken part in?
What’s the most childish thing you still enjoy doing?
What’s the most awkward way you’ve ever said goodbye to someone?
What’s the strangest item you’ve bought late at night?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done to avoid a confrontation?
What’s the most unusual thing you've done while procrastinating?
What’s the most unexpected way you've made a friend?
What’s the weirdest food combination you secretly enjoy?
Did you ever have an imaginary friend?
Do you believe in ghosts?
What’s your guilty pleasure movie?
What’s an objectively terrible song that you love to listen to?
What’s the best piece of advice you’ve ever received?
What’s your all-time favorite book?
If you could choose a new name, what would it be?
Where’s one place you’re eager to visit?
Which app do you find yourself using the most?
If you could only listen to one song for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What’s a word you really dislike?
Who in your life annoys you the most?
What’s one thing you would change about society?
Which reality show do you secretly wish you could be on?
What’s the first thing you would buy if you won the lottery?
Do you think you would survive as a character in a horror movie?
If you could pick anyone in this room to be president, who would it be and why?
What’s your go-to comfort television show?
If you met a genie, what three wishes would you ask for?
Which celebrity do you think is overrated?
What’s one job you could never see yourself doing?
If you could be invisible for a day, what would you do?
After dropping a piece of food, what’s the longest you’ve left it on the floor before eating it?
What’s a useless skill you wish you could learn?
What’s one thing you would never do for all the money in the world?
What was the last YouTube video you watched?
Who was the last person you called?
What’s a skill you wish you had?
What’s something you’re secretly proud of being good at?
What’s the most ridiculous item you feel emotionally attached to?
Who do you text the most?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your looks?
What do you love most about your body?
What’s the first online alias you remember using?
What’s your go-to fun fact about yourself?
If you could have dinner with any three people, dead or alive, who would they be?
What’s the most unusual thing you’ve ever eaten, and would you eat it again?
If you could instantly master any skill, what would it be?
What’s a quirky habit you have that most people don’t know about?
If you could time travel, which era would you visit first?
What was the most ridiculous fashion trend you followed in your youth?
What’s your favorite childhood memory that still makes you smile?
If you could live in any fictional universe, which one would it be?
What’s something on your bucket list that you hope to accomplish soon?
Whisper for the next three rounds.
Speak in an accent for the next three rounds.
Let the group give you a nickname, and use it for the rest of the game.
Sing the chorus of your favorite song at full volume.
Talk in the third person until it’s your turn again.
Act like your favorite animal until someone guesses which one it is.
Try to juggle three random objects from the room.
Speak only in rhymes for the next three rounds.
Imitate a celebrity chosen by the group for two minutes.
Do a dramatic reading of a random Wikipedia article.
Balance a random object on your head for one round.
Talk without using your tongue for the next two rounds.
Speak in a robot voice for the next three rounds.
Close your eyes and try to identify an object by touch alone.
Attempt to moonwalk across the room without falling.
Put an ice cube in your mouth and try to sing a song until it melts.
Communicate only through charades for the next two rounds.
Eat a snack while keeping your hands behind your back.
Narrate the game for the next round.
Speak in an accent for one round.
Move in slow motion for a round.
Do your best pirate impersonation.
Describe the plot of your favorite movie in the most ridiculous way possible.
Perform the Macarena without any music.
Show everyone your screen time report.
Try to drink a glass of water without using your hands or a straw.
Burp the alphabet.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again.
Talk without closing your mouth for a round.
Wear toilet paper as a scarf.
Hold your nose while talking for the next three rounds.
Balance a book on your head for a round.
Talk like a news reporter.
Speak only in song lyrics for the next five minutes.
Make a phone call and communicate only in movie quotes.
Speak only in questions for the next three rounds.
Tape your mouth shut for two rounds.
Talk as if you have no teeth for a round.
Create a tin foil hat and wear it for the rest of the night.
Pretend to be a statue until it’s your turn again.
Act out your favorite meme without using words.
Do your best impression of a baby animal.
Try to convince the group that you’re a famous person (without revealing who) for one round.
Sing everything you say for the next two rounds.
Pretend you’re a tour guide and give a tour of the room.
Show everyone your driver’s license photo (no matter how embarrassing!).
